data.title: The Man Who Got Eric Trump Into American Bitcoin Before 70% Rout
data.description: Eric Trump rang the Nasdaq bell in September to celebrate a more than $500 million windfall from American Bitcoin Corp.’s trading debut. Three months later, the shares have cratered 70%.
data.keywords: Eric Trump,AMERICAN BITCOIN CORP-A,Michael Ho,Chief Executive Officer,Cryptocurrency,US Securities and Exchange Commission,Vancouver,Florida,Asher Genoot,HUT 8 CORP,markets,crypto,business,cryptocurrencies
